Package com.bfo.zeroconf

Interface ZeroconfListener

public interface ZeroconfListener
An interface that can be added to the Zeroconf class to be notified about events. All methods on the interface have a default implementation which does nothing.
See Also:
  • Zeroconf.addListener(com.bfo.zeroconf.ZeroconfListener)
  • Zeroconf.removeListener(com.bfo.zeroconf.ZeroconfListener)
